${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:MyCard.NAME: MyCard
${modID}:MyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.

${modID}:GuardiansFate.NAME: Guardian's Fate
${modID}:GuardiansFate.DESCRIPTION: Summon the light of the Traveller to gain !B! Block and Scry !M! cards
${modID}:GuardiansFate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon the light of the Traveller to gain !B! Block and Scry !M! cards.

${modID}:BlessingOfRadiance.NAME: Blessing of Radiance
${modID}:BlessingOfRadiance.DESCRIPTION: Summon the power of the Traveler and gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light.
${modID}:BlessingOfRadiance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon the power of the Traveler and gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light.

${modID}:TravelersIncandescence.NAME: Traveler's Incandescence
${modID}:TravelersIncandescence.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Summon the power of the Traveler and gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:TravelersIncandescence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon the power of the Traveler and gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:GoldenGun.NAME: Golden Gun
${modID}:GoldenGun.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Super NL Summon a Flaming Golden Gun to deal !D! damage !M! times.
${modID}:GoldenGun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Super NL Summon a Flaming Golden Gun to deal !D! damage !M! times.

${modID}:EchoOfDilation.NAME: Echo Of Dilation
${modID}:EchoOfDilation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Apply !M! Slow and deal !D! Damage.
${modID}:EchoOfDilation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Apply !M! Slow and deal !D! Damage .

${modID}:SparkOfFeedback.NAME: Spark Of Feedback
${modID}:SparkOfFeedback.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take damage Draw !M! cards
${modID}:SparkOfFeedback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take damage Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:TouchOfVoid.NAME: Touch Of Void
${modID}:TouchOfVoid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and randomly Exhaust !M! cards

${modID}:TripmineGrenade.NAME: Tripmine Grenade
${modID}:TripmineGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies
${modID}:TripmineGrenade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:TrappersAmbush.NAME: Trapper's Ambush
${modID}:TrappersAmbush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: INNATE NL Apply !M! Weak to an enemy.

${modID}:StylishExecution.NAME: Stylish Execution
${modID}:StylishExecution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, deal damage again for each unique debuff applied to the enemy.
${modID}:StylishExecution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, deal damage again for each unique debuff applied to the enemy.

${modID}:EchoOfHarvest.NAME: Echo Of Harvest
${modID}:EchoOfHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card gain !M! Temporary HP.
${modID}:EchoOfHarvest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a card gain !M! Temporary HP.

${modID}:VanishingStep.NAME: VanishingStep
${modID}:VanishingStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and Exhaust up to 2 Cards.
${modID}:VanishingStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and Exhaust up to 2 Cards.

${modID}:EchoShield.NAME: Echo Shield
${modID}:EchoShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Generate an Ethereal Exhaust EchoShield in your hand.
${modID}:EchoShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Generate an Ethereal Exhaust EchoShield in your hand.

${modID}:EchoShieldToken.NAME: Echo Shield
${modID}:EchoShieldToken.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Exhaust NL Gain !B! Block NL Generate an Ethereal Exhaust EchoShield in your hand.
${modID}:EchoShieldToken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Generate an Ethereal Exhaust EchoShield in your hand.

${modID}:CombinationBlow.NAME: Combination Blow
${modID}:CombinationBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice gain !M! temporary Strength.
${modID}:CombinationBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice gain !M! temporary Strength.

${modID}:LightweightKnife.NAME: Lightweight Knife
${modID}:LightweightKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Burn into your discard pile.
${modID}:LightweightKnife.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Burn into your discard pile.

${modID}:EmberOfSearing.NAME: Ember of Searing
${modID}:EmberOfSearing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Burn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:EmberOfSearing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Burn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:GunpowderGamble.NAME: Gunpowder Gamble
${modID}:GunpowderGamble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. If the last card played this combat was a *Solar card, hit an extra time.
${modID}:GunpowderGamble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. If the last card played this combat was a *Solar card, hit an extra time.

${modID}:LineEmUp.NAME: Line 'Em Up
${modID}:LineEmUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage. Gain 2 ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light.
${modID}:LineEmUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage. Gain 2 ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light.

${modID}:AcrobatsDodge.NAME: Acrobat's Dodge
${modID}:AcrobatsDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.
${modID}:AcrobatsDodge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Your next Attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:BladeBarrage.NAME: Blade Barrage
${modID}:BladeBarrage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Super NL Deal !D! damage twice to all enemies.
${modID}:BladeBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Super NL Deal !D! damage twice to all enemies.

${modID}:EmberOfMercy.NAME: Ember of Mercy
${modID}:EmberOfMercy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! *Burns into your discard pile.
${modID}:EmberOfMercy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! *Burns into your discard pile.

${modID}:ElementalPlating.NAME: Elemental Plating
${modID}:ElementalPlating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Burn, discard it.
${modID}:ElementalPlating.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a *Burn, discard it.

${modID}:BarrierOfVoid.NAME: Barrier of Void
${modID}:BarrierOfVoid.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Gain !B! Block for every card in your Exhaust Pile
${modID}:BarrierOfVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Gain !B! Block for every card in your Exhaust Pile.

${modID}:ConsumeTheFuture.NAME: Consume The Future
${modID}:ConsumeTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your Draw Pile NL Generate a new Random Card for each Card Exhausted NL Randomize the cost of cards in hand NL Exhaust
${modID}:ConsumeTheFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL Exhaust your Draw Pile NL Generate a new Random Card for each Card Exhausted NL Randomize the cost of cards in hand. NL Exhaust

${modID}:FeedTheVoid.NAME: Feed The Void
${modID}:FeedTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn Exhaust one card
${modID}:FeedTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn Exhaust one card

${modID}:SpectralBlades.NAME: Spectral Blades
${modID}:SpectralBlades.DESCRIPTION: Take half damage and gain 3 Strength for !M! Turns
${modID}:SpectralBlades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take half damage and gain 3 Strength for !M! Turns

${modID}:StareIntoTheVoid.NAME: Stare Into The Void
${modID}:StareIntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Lose !M! Percent Hp Exhume 1 Card
${modID}:StareIntoTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Lose !M! Percent Hp Exhume 1 Card

${modID}:EmbraceMadness.NAME: Embrace Madness
${modID}:EmbraceMadness.DESCRIPTION: Block for !B! and if the enemy Intends to Attack apply !M! Vulnerable
${modID}:EmbraceMadness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block for !B! and if the enemy Intends to Attack apply !M! Vulnerable

${modID}:ExpelDarkness.NAME: Expel Darkness
${modID}:ExpelDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to All Enemies
${modID}:ExpelDarkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to All Enemies

${modID}:Deadshot.NAME: Deadshot
${modID}:Deadshot.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Vigor.
${modID}:Deadshot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:ShunTheLight.NAME: Shun The Light
${modID}:ShunTheLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If you have !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light lose !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light NL gain !B! Block.
${modID}:ShunTheLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If you have !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light lose !M! ${modID}:Charge_Of_Light NL gain !B! Block.
